proposal: Diving into the world of Aether: Trading Card Game with its 200+ unique cards and vibrant animated art, it's clear you're reshaping the digital trading card scene. Congrats on reaching 148 holders in the ETH network! If you're looking to expand the in-game economy, our DEX and Lottery tools could seamlessly integrate, offering your community new ways to craft, trade, and engage. Let's deal the next hand together.
